line.name: ACE
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/12/2014  2:25PM

Due to track maintenance at Queens Plaza, the following service changes are in effect:

Northbound [E], [F] and [R] trains are running with delays.

Northbound [E] and [R] trains are running express from Queens Plaza to Jackson Heights- Roosevelt Av.

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 04/12/2014  2:02PM

Due to track maintenance at W 4 St, [A], [C], [E] and [F] trains are running with delays in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Work
[E] Jamaica Center-bound trains skip 75 Av and Van Wyck Blvd

Weekend, 12:15 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Apr 12 - 14

For service to 75 Av, take the [E] to Union Tpke and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [E] or [F].

For service to Van Wyck Blvd, take the [E] to Jamaica-Van Wyck and transfer to a
World Trade Center-bound [E].

For service from these stations, take the [E] or [F] to Union Tpke or 71 Av and transfer to a
Jamaica Center-bound [E].




Planned Work

Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Apr 11 - 14

For service to these stations, take the [E] to W 4 St or 34 St and transfer to a
World Trade Center-bound [E].

For service from these stations, take the [E] to 14 St or Canal St and transfer
to a Jamaica Center-bound [E].




Planned Work
[C] Euclid Av-bound trains skip 50 St, 23 St and Spring St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Apr 12 - 13

For service to 50 St, take the [C] to 42 St and transfer to an uptown [E].

For service to 23 St, transfer to the [E] at 42 St (across the platform).

For service from these stations, take the [E]. Transfer to the [C] at 42 St or 14 St.

For Spring St, take the [E] or [F]*. Transfer between trains at W 4 St or Canal St.

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Apr 12 - 13

For service to Spring and 23 Sts, take the [C] to W 4 St or 34 St and transfer
to a downtown [E].

For service to 50 St, transfer to the [E] at 42 St.

For service from these stations, take the [E] to 42 St, 14 St or Canal St
and transfer to a 168 St-bound [C].

Weekends, 11:15 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Apr 14

Trains resume regular service at 47-50 Sts.

No Coney Island-bound [F] service at 21 St-Queensbridge, Roosevelt Island,
Lexington Av/63 St and 57 St.

Travel Alternatives

For service to these stations, take the [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from 21 St-Queensbridge and Roosevelt Island, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av
and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].

From Lexington Av/63 St, use the nearby 59 St [4] [5] [6] Station for downtown local service
to 51 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F] at the [E] [M] platform.

From 57 St, use the nearby 57 St-7 Av [N] [Q] [R] Station for downtown service to
34 St-Herald Sq where Coney Island-bound [F] service is available.

and transfer to a Chambers St-bound [J].

For service from these stations, take the [J] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J].

line.name: Bronx-Whitestone
line.text:
BWB - 6 AM to 3 PM Three (3) Lanes Bronx-bound. Two (2) Lanes Queens-bound.

            3 PM to 6 AM Three (3) Lanes Queens-bound. Two (2) Lanes Bronx-bound.

line.name: Far Rockaway
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/11/2014  9:00PM

This weekend, April 12-13, and the weekend of May 3-4, a waterproofing project on the 150th Street Bridge, located east of Jamaica Station, will result in schedule changes for weekend Far Rockaway Branch customers.

 

The following service will be affected:

 

Westbound

Most westbound weekend trains will depart stations Far Rockaway through Valley Stream up to 8 minutes earlier than normal.

 

Eastbound

Most eastbound weekend trains will be held at Jamaica for up to 8 minutes, and will arrive at stations Valley Stream to Far Rockaway up to 8 minutes later than normal.

 

Additionally, the 12:15 AM weekend train from Atlantic Terminal (12:36 AM train

from Jamaica) will not make its usual stops at Locust Manor, Laurelton or Rosedale. Alternate service to Locust Manor, Laurelton and Rosedale will be available about 20 minutes earlier or one hour later on the following Long Beach-bound trains:

. 12:18 AM train from Jamaica to Long Beach

. 1:41 AM train from Jamaica to Long Beach

 

Pick up a copy of the special Far Rockaway weekend timetable dated April 12-13 & May 3-4 for departure times, or see http://bit.ly/1hoRo0D

line.name: Hempstead
line.text:
Planned Work

This weekend, April12-13, and the weekend of April 26-27, westbound train service to and from Queens Village and Hollis stations on the Hempstead Branch will be replaced by bus service as we perform trackwork.

 

On both weekends, buses will replace trains at Queens Village and Hollis from 10:20 PM Friday evening until at 3:30 AM Monday morning.  Eastbound train service to or from these stations will not be affected.

 

Westbound to Queens Village and Hollis

Hempstead Branch customers traveling west to Queens Village or Hollis stations will disembark at Bellerose and board a bus for direct service to either Queens Village or Hollis. Plan on up to 20 minutes additional travel time.

 

Westbound from Queens Village and Hollis

Customers normally beginning their westbound train trip at Queens Village or Hollis stations will instead board buses leaving up to 14 minutes later than regular train departure time for direct service to Jamaica, where trains to points west are available. Plan on up to 22 minutes additional travel time.

 

Pick up a copy of the special Hempstead Branch timetable or see http://bit.ly/1hdL6jz

line.name: West Hempstead
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/11/2014 11:35PM

There is no weekend service on the West Hempstead Branch. As an alternative, customers are advised to use the Hempstead, Lynbrook, Valley Stream or Merillon Avenue stations (all located in Fare Zone 4).

line.name: Wassaic
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/11/2014  7:33PM

Substitute bus service will be provided on Saturday, April 12, and Sunday, April 13. This service change is to accommodate track work. To New York (from Wassaic to Harlem Valley Wingdale): Southbound buses departing Wassaic will replace trains from 6:05 AM to 11:07 PM. To Wassaic (from Harlem Valley Wingdale to Wassaic): Northbound buses departing Harlem Valley Wingdale will replace trains from 9:52 AM thru 2:03 AM. For schedule times, visit http://tinyurl.com/6akjw

line.name: New Haven
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 04/12/2014  2:01PM

Haven Line Customers should anticipate 30 minute delays in both directions due to circuit problems between Milford and West Haven. Please listen for announcements at your station.

line.name: Danbury
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/03/2014  6:13PM

A temporary Danbury schedule will be in effect starting Saturday, March 1, until further notice, to provide a more reliable service while contractors for Metro-North and the Connecticut Dept. of Transportation (ConnDOT) work to resolve the problem with the new grade crossing system. This problem has necessitated "Stop and Warn" procedures to ensure safe train movements past each crossing, resulting in delays. The schedule will include time adjustments for most weekday peak-period trains as well as substitute busing for weekday off-peak and weekend service. For more information, visit http://tinyurl.com/lf8tthl
